title: Rich Lister hires BlueScope executive to rebuild Pact
text:
Rich Lister Raphael Geminder has hired a former executive from steel group BlueScope to begin the painstaking task of rebuilding confidence in ailing packaging firm Pact Group.

Sanjay Dayal was the chief executive of building products, corporate strategy and innovation at BlueScope, where he worked for nine years until 2018 after a decade-long stint at explosives and chemicals group Orica.

Rich Lister Raphael Geminder (centre) has hired a former BlueScope executive to run Pact Group. Josh Robenstone

Mr Geminder will revert to being chairman of Pact on April 3 when Mr Dayal takes over.

Mr Geminder, who holds a 39 per cent stake in Pact, took over the day-to-day running of the business last year when former chief executive Malcolm Bundey abruptly departed as the financial performance deteriorated.

The share price has plunged 33 per cent since early February.
description: Raphael Geminder says Sanjay Dayal has the skills and experience to revive the ailing company's manufacturing and supply chain.
